text: St. Matthias Church and variations such as Saint Matthias' Church may refer to various churches, some named specifically for Saint Matthias: ==Australia== * St Matthias' Anglican Church, Paddington, a parish church in the Anglican Diocese of Sydney * St Matthias' Anglican Church, Woodford, a parish church in the Anglican Diocese of Brisbane ==Canada== *St. Matthias, Bellwoods, Anglo- Catholic church in Toronto, Ontario ==England== *St Matthias' Church, Farm Street, Birmingham *St Matthias, Bristol *St Matthias' Church, Burley *St Matthias Church, Richmond, Anglican church in Richmond, London *St Matthias the Apostle church, Colindale, Anglican church in Colindale, London *St Matthias Old Church, in Poplar, East End, London *St Matthias' Church, Canning Town, east London *St. Matthias' Church, Stoke Newington, Anglican church in Stoke Newington, north London *St Matthias' Church, Malvern Link *St. Matthias' Church, Nottingham ==Germany== *St. Matthias' Abbey, a Benedictine monastery in Trier, Rhineland-Palatinate ==Hungary== *Matthias Church, Budapest ==India== *St. Matthias' Church, Kunnamkulam, in Kerala, a Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church *St. Matthias' Church, Vepery, in Chennai ==New Zealand== *St. Matthias’ Church, Makara, an Anglican Church in Makara, an outlying suburb of the capital city Wellington. https://wellingtoncityheritage.org.nz/buildings/151-300/196-st-matthias ==Nigeria== *St. Mattias Anglican Church Anaku, in Anaku Town, of Anambra State, South-Eastern Nigeria ==Philippines== * San Matias Parish, in Santo Tomas, Pampanga * San Matias Parish, in Tumauini, Isabela ==Sri Lanka== *St Matthias’ Church, Lakshapathiya, Moratuwa, Sri Lanka ==United States== *St. Matthias Roman Catholic Church, Ridgewood, Queens, New York *St. Matthias' Episcopal Church (Omaha, Nebraska), NRHP-listed in Douglas County *St. Matthias Episcopal Church (Asheville, North Carolina), NRHP-listed in Buncombe County *St. Matthias Mission, near New Fane, Wisconsin, listed on the National Register of Historic Places *St. Matthias Episcopal Church (Waukesha, Wisconsin), NRHP-listed in Waukesha County ==See also== *St. Matthias Episcopal Church (disambiguation), including several churches in the United States *St. Matthews' Episcopal Church (disambiguation) *St. Matthias School, Wolverhampton, West Midlands, England *St. Matthias Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School, in St. Matthias Church Compound, Chennai, India *Saint Matthias (disambiguation)
title: St. Matthias Church
